Hi,

I am trying to make a heat transfer function that acts on a reactor 
w=
all in a closed batch reactor. I know that it is possible to implement 
hea=
t transfer as a function of time, but is it possible to take the 
reactor t=
emperature at each iteration step, then apply a heat loss 
function that us=
es that temperature before calculating the next step.

Anyone have any expe=
rience with such things?

Many thanks in advance,

Adam.
